page.syntax: Result_Name as C = UniqueNameGet(C existing ,C suggested )

argument.name: existing
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of names for comparison.

argument.name: suggested
argument.description: The base name to make unique.

page.description: Takes a CRLF delimited list of existing names and a suggested name and increments a counter at end of suggested name until it is unique.
page.discussion: The UniqueNameGet() function takes a CR-LF delimited list of existing names and a suggested name and increments a counter at end of suggested name until it is unique.
page.example: Dim existingNames as C existingNames = comma_to_crlf("Firstname, Firstname1, Firstname2") ? UniqueNameGet(existingNames, "Firstname") ="Firstname3" existingNames = comma_to_crlf("Firstname3, Firstname1, Firstname2") ? UniqueNameGet(existingNames, "Firstname") = "Firstname"
